solarium.swing
Class ProgressBarThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      solarium.swing.ProgressBarThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ProgressBarThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Represents a thread that uses a progress bar to display its status. Since this class is a thread it can be ectended or given a runnable to create a process. The process logic can control the progress status using:

  • setMinimum(int)
  • setProgress(int)
  • setMaximum(int)
displays a message, progress bar and option buttons.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ravi Narain Bhatia
See Also:
ProgressMonitor
